definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: When you have the measles, you break out in spots.
sentences.chinese: 當你得麻疹時會出疹子。

sentences.english: Global measles deaths decreased by 78% during this period.
sentences.chinese: 在此期間，全球麻疹死亡率下降了78%。

sentences.english: A child receives a measles vaccine from a doctor at Bozhou, Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 一個孩子在安徽省博州市接受麻疹疫苗。

sentences.english: Most of the reactions were mild and of the urticarial type.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的不良反應是不嚴重的蕁麻疹類型的。

sentences.english: Measles can cause temporary complications, such as convulsions (fits) and diarrhoea.
sentences.chinese: 麻疹能引起暫時併發症，如驚厥和腹瀉。

sentences.english: Treatment depends on which type or types of urticaria you have.
sentences.chinese: 治療取決於哪些類型的蕁麻疹你。

sentences.english: The darling of albumen allergy, hives .
Objective To analyze the effect of behavior therapy on treating chronic urticaria .
sentences.chinese: 目的分析行爲療法治療慢性蕁麻疹的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: The disease is also spreading through India and the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲的印度和菲律賓國內也出現了麻疹病毒的蔓延。

sentences.english: Number of one-year-olds fully immunized against measles rose from 30 to 40percent.
sentences.chinese: 1歲孩子完全免疫麻疹的比例從30%增加到40%。

sentences.english: The measles and chicken pox vaccines also are made from a live attenuated virus.
sentences.chinese: 麻疹和水痘疫苗也是由經稀釋的活病毒製成。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the cause of a measles outbreak in Wengyuan County.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析廣東省翁源縣一起麻疹暴發的原因。

sentences.english: The sufferer of measles usually has a high fever and small red spots on the skin.
sentences.chinese: 麻疹患者通常高燒，並且皮膚上有小紅點。

sentences.english: The child goes hives how to should be in charge of protect, what is optimal treatment program?
sentences.chinese: 小孩出麻疹應該如何管護，最佳治療方案是什麼？
麻疹使這個小女孩很不舒服。

sentences.english: The child took measles, and then on the back of that came pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 孩子出了麻疹，緊接着又患了肺炎。

definition: epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
hand foot and mouth disease, HFMD, caused by a number of intestinal viruses, usually affecting young children
epidemic encephalitis B, aka Japanese encephalitis
